word_mean_info__list.difference: 的含义为“替换”，“取代”。如：George has replaced Edward as captain of the team.(乔石治已接替爱德华担任队长。)
则表示“用……代替”。如：We substitute nylon for cotton.(我们用尼龙代替了棉花。)
侧重指用另外的人或物强行取代并非称职的人或无用之物，指人时往往暗含带不满情绪的意味。
最普通用词，指任何形式的替代，尤指以新的替代旧的、老的和坏的等，指人指物均可。
指某人因故不在时，由别人代理其职，有时也可指由一物去代替另一物。

word_group.brief_definition: 更换碳粉；更换调色剂；更换增色剂

bilingual.source: It is unlikely that robot teachers will replace real teachers.
bilingual.target: 机器人教师不太可能取代真正的教师。

bilingual.source: They decided to replace the old equipment.
bilingual.target: 他们决定取代旧的设备。

bilingual.source: The new manager will replace the old one.
bilingual.target: 新的经理将取代旧的经理。

bilingual.source: We need to replace this broken light bulb.
bilingual.target: 我们需要取代这个坏掉的灯泡。

bilingual.source: This new software can replace the old version.
bilingual.target: 这个新软件可以取代旧版本。
机器人可能会取代一些工人的工作。

bilingual.source: The company decided to replace the old manager with a new hireling.
bilingual.target: 公司决定用一个新的雇员取代旧经理。
数字生活可以取代人类文明。

bilingual.source: It may soon replace the traditional economic model.
bilingual.target: 它可能很快会取代传统的经济模式。

bilingual.source: I came to feel much better as I knew that no one could ever replace me.
bilingual.target: 我感觉好多了，因为我知道没有人可以取代我。

list.abstract: Replace是Python、VB、ASP、Windows、SQL和Excel中的函数，功能都是执行替换操作.另外，replace在英语中的意思为take ones position.
Replace是一个英文单词，动词译为代替，替换，把什么放回原位， （用什么）替换。

yingyinNormal.en: Or whispering in her husband's ear that he'll never replace me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或是低声在他老公耳边说，丫永远别想取代我。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe I don't want to do dumb stuff with you all the time, but that doesn't mean you get to replace me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许我不想老跟着你做一些傻事，可是这不代表你能找人取代我。

yingyinNormal.en: You got me removed from my own project? Yeah, and it wasn't easy. Apparently, you're very difficult to replace.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你让我被自己的项目撤下来了？对，而且一点都不容易。显然你很难被取代。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Are you kidding me? I could never replace you. If it were up to me, we'd do everything together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？你开玩笑吗？我永远不可能找人取代你，如果我来决定，我们会一起做所有的事。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you know what he did? He watched me work for ten minutes, and then started to design a simple piece of software that could replace me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道他干了什么吗？他看着我做了10分钟，然后开始设计一个可以取代我的简易软件。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you please stop spinning that sign? No. My boss says if I do, he'll replace me with one of those guys! Go back to where you came from!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你能别转那个广告牌了吗？不行，我老板说我要是停了，他就找个那种人来取代我，回你来的地方去！

yingyinNormal.en: You can't replace me with Zack. Why not? Penny did it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们不能让扎克代替我。为啥不行？佩妮不就这么做了。

yingyinNormal.en: We need to breach those carriers and replace their targeting blades with our own.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们得攻击那些天空母舰，把定位刀锋换成我们自己的。

yingyinNormal.en: When the kids get old, new ones come in. When they get old, new ones replace them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一群孩子长大了，又一群孩子进园来，大孩子走了，新宝宝来了，周而复始。

yingyinNormal.en: We can't do anything about Austen. The question now is who do we get to replace him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 奥斯汀这条路已经不通了，问题是我们能找谁来代替他？

yingyinNormal.en: A long time ago, someone figured out how to replace deteriorating cells with new ones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很久之前就有人发现了如何用新细胞代替衰老的细胞。

yingyinNormal.en: These animals can replace thousands of boots on the ground. How many lives would that save?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种动物在地面上可以代替成千上万个机器人，这将会拯救多少生命？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, the girl they picked to play Mimi, she dropped out, and they asked me to replace her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们选中的那个女孩她退出了，然后他们让我替代她。

yingyinNormal.en: What if I suggested that you could serve in the leadership this term? To replace me, as whip.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我说你这一届就能进入领导层呢？接替我，做党鞭。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, stop. No, no, no, no. No. We're not gonna replace those kids. We're gonna get them back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 行了，别说了，不... 我们不会不管那些孩子，我们要把他们找回来。

yingyinNormal.en: They can replace them with new problems such as alcoholism, gambling addiction, and sexually transmitted diseases.
yingyinNormal.zh: 直接用新烦恼替代比如酗酒，赌博，性传播疾病。

yingyinNormal.en: I will replace it, I promise. I feel so terrible. All right, sweetie that's fine. You didn't do it on purpose. No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我保证会赔你一副新的，我真的很愧疚。没关系，你又不是故意的。

yingyinNormal.en: In order to reverse the ray, we would need to replace the Medusa Serum with a power source of almost immeasurable cuteness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了扭转射线，我们需要把美杜莎血清替换成另一种无敌可爱的能源。

yingyinNormal.en: Life is trying to replace you. Life moves fast. Life does a good job. Wait. You're actually leaving. You're really gonna go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 生活想要以他替代你，生活的反应真快，它终于做了件好事。等等，其实你会走的，你真的要走了。

yingyinNormal.en: You're trying to replace Johnny Damon. The Boston Red Sox see Johnny Damon and they see a star who's worth $7.5 million a year.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在寻觅顶替乔尼戴蒙的人，在红袜队看来乔尼戴蒙是个年薪七百五十万的球星。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 更换; 取代; 接替

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 更换; 取代; 接替

examination_example.sentence: AI <highlight>replaces</highlight> the boring parts of your job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人工智能取代了你工作中无聊的部分。

examination_example.sentence: Here are a few other ways AI is aiding companies without <highlight>replacing</highlight> employees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以下是人工智能在不替换员工的情况下帮助公司的一些其他方式。

examination_example.sentence: Despite trade competition and outsourcing, American manufacturing still needs to <highlight>replace</highlight> tens of thousands of retiring boomers every year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管存在贸易竞争和外包，美国制造业每年仍需要取代数万名退休的婴儿潮一代。

sense_info_list.en: to put sth back in the place where it was before

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 事情, 真实的, 事物

word_usage.usage: replace作及物动词，其后可直接接名词或代词，常与介词by或with连用，如：replace meals with snacks用零食代替正餐。
replace在表示“取代某人而作为……”时，常和介词as连用，如：He made John replace me as goal-keeper. 他让约翰代替我当守门员。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 替代；更换；复位；替代者；替代物；接替者

word_family.mean: v. 代替；取代；放回；把…放回原处；替换；更换；替代

sense_info_list.en: put in the place of another; switch seemingly equivalent items

examination_example.sentence: What Are the Ethics of CGI Actors—And Will They <highlight>Replace</highlight> Real Ones?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 计算机合成的演员的道德原则是什么？他们会取代真正的演员吗？

examination_example.sentence: By <highlight>replacing</highlight> expensive grain feed with regenerative management practices, grass-fed farmers are insulated from jumps in the price of feed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过再生管理实践代替昂贵的谷物饲料。草饲农户免受饲料价格上涨的影响。

examination_example.sentence: Of course, some worry lies in <highlight>replacing</highlight> agricultural workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，一些担忧在于农业工人的替代问题。

sense_info_list.en: take the place or move into the position of
put something back to where is belongs

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: put in the place of another; switch seemingly equivalent items

examination_example.sentence: In turn, advanced technology makes people become lazier after <highlight>replacing</highlight> human beings to do what they should have done.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 反过来，先进的技术让人们在代替人类做了他们应该做的事情后变得更加懒惰。

examination_example.sentence: It may soon <highlight>replace</highlight> the traditional economic model.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可能很快会取代传统的经济模式。

examination_example.sentence: We will send a van to collect those four and <highlight>replace</highlight> them with the Milano you purchased.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们将派一辆货车来收集这四个，并用你购买的米兰替换它们。

sense_info_list.en: take the place or move into the position of

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: A code uses symbols to <highlight>replace</highlight> words, phrases, or sentences.

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 替代；更换；复位；替代者；替代物；接替者

word_family.mean: v. 代替；取代；放回；把…放回原处；替换；更换；替代

examination_example.sentence: I came to feel much better as I knew that no one could ever <highlight>replace</highlight> me．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我感觉好多了，因为我知道没有人可以取代我。

examination_example.sentence: It's good to enjoy other cultures and to learn from them, but they cannot <highlight>replace</highlight> your own culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 享受其他文化并向他们学习是很好的，但是他们不能取代你自己的文化。

examination_example.sentence: Do you think e-books will <highlight>replace</highlight> paper books in your life?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你认为电子书会在你的生活中取代纸质书吗?

examination_example.sentence: For example, someone may have lost blood in accidents, or have a serious illness that requires his blood to be <highlight>replaced</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，某人可能在事故中失血，或患有严重的疾病，需要补充血液。

examination_example.sentence: If we remove more fresh water than nature <highlight>replaces</highlight>, we have taken too much.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们移走的淡水比自然所能更替的还要多，那么我们已经取走了太多的淡水。

examination_example.sentence: Before we could <highlight>replace</highlight> the power supply, we would have to remove from the telescope a handrail fixed with four screws.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们更换电源之前，我们必须从望远镜上取下一个用四个螺丝固定的扶手。
